rooms.name: AcmOffice
rooms.description: You are in the ACM office.  There are lots of friendly ACM people.

rooms.name: PentagonNorthHallway
rooms.description: You are in the north hallway.  You can see Pentagon 1112 and the door toward NCSA.

rooms.name: PentagonEntry
rooms.description: You are in the west entry of Pentagon Center. You can see the elevator, the ACM office, and hallways to the north and east.

rooms.name: Pentagon1112
rooms.description: You are in Pentagon 1112.  There is space for two code reviews in this room.

rooms.name: Pentagon1314
rooms.description: You are in Pentagon 1314.  There are happy CS 126 students doing a code review.

rooms.name: PentagonBasement
rooms.description: You are in the basement of Pentagon.  You see tables with students working and door to computer labs.

rooms.name: PentagonEastHallway
rooms.description: You are in the east hallway.  You can see Einstein Bros' Bagels and a stairway.
